FAQ.question: How does this work?
FAQ.answer: Simply put, we deliver your favourite menu from fast-food restaurant of choice. Our platform enables you to enter your postcode and select a nearby restaurant of choice e.g McDonalds, KFC, …Wagamama e.t.c for delivery. Within each of these restaurants you will find their menus which you can add to basket, choose your payment method (PayPal or Credit / Debit Card) and submit. There you go, your order is sent to the selected restaurant or the nearby delivery driver where applicable.

FAQ.question: How do I take away my order?
